name: Emotional Refrain
description:
Emotional Refrain is a fan story based on Project SEKAI COLORFUL STAGE! feat. Hatsune Miku. Follow the growing friendship between Emu Ootori and her senior, Mafuyu Asahina. How will both find comfort in one another regardless of their clashing personalities...?

Notice: Emotional Refrain is from the beginning to the end a fangame and in no shape or form an official product. The story and events are all based on self-interpretation.

The rights to the characters and original backgrounds belong to SEGA and Colorful Palette.

Music :

    8 bit Paradise by nashmusiclibrary

    Begin Your Journey by Pix

    Memo by super noot ensemble

    My Last Dream by Pix

    No More Worries by Pix

2022-08-09: This game was created as a school project. It was my first time coding and writing a story by myself. I am uploading this for archiving purposes. Unfortunately, it is not completed and will most likely never be, as I cannot find the game script in my folders anymore. Nevertheless, thank you for checking this page out! :)
